other_tests.findings: 5-fold increase of serum aspartate aminotransferase/alanine aminotransferase concentrations in patient 1; slight increase of serum ALT and AST after the fifth cycle of IVGC in patient 2.
other_tests.changes_over_time: In patient 1, liver function remained normal after resuming IVGC without simvastatin. In patient 2, a further increase of aminotransferase values was observed three weeks after IVGC discontinuation, with progressive normalization after statin withdrawal.

other_tests.date: 6 weeks after discontinuation of IVGC in patient 2
other_tests.findings: Moderate lymphomonocytic portal and lobular inflammation, with scattered plasma cells and eosinophils, focal interface and bridging necrosis, and diffuse centrilobular necrosis, consistent with a diagnosis of acute hepatitis of probable toxic etiology.
